explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses integrating state-of-the-art deep learning and machine learning methods to identify price trends of US equities.
explanations.deep learning: The paper focuses on constructing a new framework integrating deep learning methods to improve price momentum strategies.
explanations.clustering: The paper proposes a new modular approach built on deep learning clustering methods.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses neural networks, specifically recurrent neural networks, as part of its methodology.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper mentions using recurrent neural networks in its proposed modular approach.
explanations.representation learning: The paper's use of deep learning implies some form of representation learning to identify price trends.
